verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba yetu wa mbinguni (jina),
jina lako litukuzwe daima.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ufalme wako utufikie,
duniani Kama mbinguni
(Baba).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Utupe leo riziki zetu,
utusamehe makosa yetu
(Baba).

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Kwa kuwa ufalme
ni wako Baba,
na nguvu na utukufu
(Baba).
